LF017.LF017_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf18"/][UE:Meta key="f7349f8ab90d4090bc52cc9273d3d756" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Ah,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you're the one who rescued me?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f7349f8ab90d4090bc52cc9273d3d756" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I'm [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf18"/]Fawks[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I know what comes next.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You
want me to thank you, right?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f7349f8ab90d4090bc52cc9273d3d756" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]By the way,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] how much are you charging
me for that?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I do hope it's not exorbitant.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f7349f8ab90d4090bc52cc9273d3d756" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]It's what?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It's free?![etc:Wait frame="8"/] So this "Rescue
Corps" is a charity group, then?
LF017.LF017_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf18"/][UE:Meta key="4891cd2711ac4c1e9e2056c96c20a9f7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I wonder...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You know,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf12"/]Alpin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and I traveled
here together,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but somehow he was
rescued before me.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4891cd2711ac4c1e9e2056c96c20a9f7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I mean,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we were on the same spaceship.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Did I land in a bad location?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4891cd2711ac4c1e9e2056c96c20a9f7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Great,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've fallen behind him now.
LF017.LF017_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf18"/][UE:Meta key="9605755d2b864f659b6f92a6dc1a843e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadTalk"/]It all looks like hard work,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] really.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] If I were
you,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'd take a little time to relax.
LF017.LF017_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf18"/][UE:Meta key="38b832e3e5564cd7b5d4dc744cf39704" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Do you plan to continue working for the
Rescue Corps?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] If so,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you might want to
take a few breaks so you don't burn out.
LF017.LF017_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf18"/][UE:Meta key="4eb335972989419a858fb36ed7511e62" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf12"/]Alpin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and I have known each other a
long time.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We seem to get along well
despite our differences.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4eb335972989419a858fb36ed7511e62" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]Or maybe he just puts up with me.
LF017.LF017_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf18"/][UE:Meta key="1d17a0ee6307493e9b8d6309ae22aad2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I'm what you would call an investor.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1d17a0ee6307493e9b8d6309ae22aad2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]You might not guess it by looking at me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but I used to own multiple IT companies.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1d17a0ee6307493e9b8d6309ae22aad2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I eventually sold them all and used the
resulting assets to set myself up as
an investor.
LF017.LF017_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf18"/][UE:Meta key="6ded4374d40d439e9b28770ab9c463e5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I decided to come here with [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf12"/]Alpin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] because
he told me that he was going to develop
new businesses.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6ded4374d40d439e9b28770ab9c463e5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]There are a lot of interesting things here,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
so investing in him seems like a sound
financial move.
LF017.LF017_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf18"/][UE:Meta key="5d45d1227edf4f45904f6c7a2f85985b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Lately,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I make a living by being a corporate
adviser,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] consultant,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and guest speaker.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5d45d1227edf4f45904f6c7a2f85985b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]I give advice about things like business-
management policies and advertising.
LF017.LF017_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf18"/][UE:Meta key="aa3033a59de64266902ee6af98f5806a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Observing different companies' business
trends is part of my daily routine.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I might
even say it's become my hobby.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="aa3033a59de64266902ee6af98f5806a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]My other hobby is collecting news.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I save
articles and follow the state of affairs.
LF017.LF017_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf18"/][UE:Meta key="6c22d18985f645bb9b350b491e50333e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf12"/]Alpin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] can be a handful.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] He likes to do
things his own way,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so he needs someone
to be the voice of reason.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6c22d18985f645bb9b350b491e50333e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]One time,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he had this business idea I told
him was no good,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but he didn't listen.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] He
was so sure it would be successful.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6c22d18985f645bb9b350b491e50333e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]He got burned pretty bad on that one.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I guess that's when he started listening
to me more.
LF017.LF017_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf18"/][UE:Meta key="4ece91eff984493ab0bcff94dd46464c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladTalk"/]Since the Rescue Corps Officers saved
me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've had a chance to recover from
being leafified.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4ece91eff984493ab0bcff94dd46464c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]When I was a leafling,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] everything was very
strange.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I felt like I was possessed.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4ece91eff984493ab0bcff94dd46464c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I was completely obsessed with the art of
Dandori.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It was alarming.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Every thought
was about utilizing efficient Dandori skills.
LF017.LF017_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf18"/][UE:Meta key="42af825b88564d929838da3c00d46588" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Honestly,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm not really a social person.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It's probably why I'm not that comfortable
in group settings.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="42af825b88564d929838da3c00d46588" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]That was one of the reasons I chose to be
an investor.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You don't really need a lot of
close interaction with others.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="42af825b88564d929838da3c00d46588" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf12"/]Alpin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] crosses my social boundaries,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
somehow I don't mind when he does it.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I
guess that's how he became a good friend.
LF017.LF017_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf18"/][UE:Meta key="871cd9b089184b75828af9e87c4aaaa9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadTalk"/]It all looks like hard work,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] really.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] If I were
you,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'd take a little time to relax.
LF017.LF017_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf18"/][UE:Meta key="5cba117e5c9c456eb126e57aaaedbdee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Do you plan to continue working for the
Rescue Corps?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] If so,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you might want to
take a few breaks so you don't burn out.
LF017.LF017_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Leaf18"/][UE:Meta key="8f8bffd55ccd40da9fc6ec0d3ce3cdfc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Are you actually trying to lick my face?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8f8bffd55ccd40da9fc6ec0d3ce3cdfc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]I'd rather you didn't.
LF017.LF017_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Leaf18"/][UE:Meta key="ce7540d8f02746cc85dbb0ac18f682c2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Did you just try to sniff my rear?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ce7540d8f02746cc85dbb0ac18f682c2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]I get that it's a dog thing,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but maybe don't.
LF017.LF017_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf18"/][UE:Meta key="dc4b5909bd514f0abb48325afddc552e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Hey,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] have you noticed that we could
almost be twins?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="dc4b5909bd514f0abb48325afddc552e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]Ah,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] sorry.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I guess I made that kind
of awkward.
